key.name: watchedpath
key.description: This is the path the applet will watch for any new contents. It will display these and allow you to open them with your default launcher.

key.name: excludeflags
key.description: This is where the switches such as "show hidden files" and "show directories" are stored.

key.name: excludepatterns
key.description: This is where the custom exclude filter field gets stored, using a comma in the pattern is NOT supported.
